name: Jeffrey Jey
description: '''Gianfranco Randone''' ({{IPA|it|dʒaɱˈfraŋko ranˈdoːne}}; born 5 January 1970), known by his stage name '''Jeffrey Jey''', is an Italian musician and singer-songwriter, best known as the lead vocalist of the group [[Eiffel 65]] (1997–2005, 2010–present). He was also the lead singer of the groups [[Bliss Team]] (1992–1997) and [[Bloom 06]] (2005–2010). After Eiffel 65's reunion in June 2010, he toured Italy and Europe with the band. In addition to singing, Jey also plays bass guitar, electric guitar, drums and [[Electronic keyboard|keyboards]].
